name: Varanasi
description:
"'VARANASI' is a very short interactive piece about fascism.
It uses a one-button interaction system to tell a specific story of resistance, and strips the idea of authoritarianism to a raw, simple, metaphorical core.
Its main motifs are also conveyed through its use of color, symmetric composition, scale, hand-drawn visuals mixed with photo editing, sound and silence."
